abstract: For people who can't find time in their day for exercise, the solution may be rethinking how they commute to work.
snippet: For people who can't find time in their day for exercise, the solution may be rethinking how they commute to work.
lead_paragraph: For people who can't find time in their day for exercise, the solution may be rethinking how they commute to work. The latest Global Athlete column explores the benefits of "active" commuting by walking or riding a bike to the office.

headline.main: How Active Is Your Daily Commute?
